content:
Hey everyone, I will be taking a break from rust for the next couple weeks. If something is really wrong you can ping me on Discord, but I don't plan to open up Zulip for a while nor check Discord actively.

@GuillaumeGomez sorry this means I won't have time to review the CACHE_DATA PR - feel free to r=me, you can always revert if something goes wrong.

I trust everyone on the team to keep things running :)
@DPC is there a way to let the triage team know? or tell highfive not to assign me just for a couple weeks?
Send a PR to highfive to remove yourself from rotation
I hope everything's fine on your side and thanks for all your work!
You don't need to do that for 2 weeks
got it, take care Joshua Nelson
I will be taking a break for a month or so and won't be able to review PRs. I opened https://github.com/rust-lang/highfive/pull/335 and have been reassigning my existing PRs.
